items.title: Dexcom Issues Recall for G7, ONE+ Apps for Software Issues
items.description: Dexcom has issued a recall for G7 and ONE+ Apps due to a software error. Medscape Medical News

items.title: ATA Issues New Guidelines for Differentiated Thyroid Cancer

items.title: GLP-1s Don’t Raise DTC Recurrence Risk, Study Says
items.description: Patients with differentiated thyroid cancer treated with the GLP-1s showed no increased risk of recurrence over a more than 5-year follow-up. Medscape...

items.title: Parent Mental Health Crisis Doubles Youth Suicide Risk
items.description: Maternal and two-parent diseases of despair conveyed a higher risk for child suicidal events compared with paternal mental illness. Medscape Medical N...

items.title: Higher Ferritin Threshold Identifies More Adults With Anemia
items.description: The AGA’s revised ferritin criteria expanded anemia detection, identifying 3.3 million more affected adults in the US. Medscape Medical News
